document.full_text: hsbc holdings plc , europe's biggest bank, will find most of the $3.5 billion it wants to save by trimming staff and cutting less profitable operations outside of asia, its chief executive said on thursday.
document.title: hsbc says cost cuts to come from outside asia
lines_and_colors: hsbc holdings plc , europe's biggest bank, will find most of the $3.5 billion it wants to save by trimming staff and cutting less profitable operations outside of asia, its chief executive said on thursday.
